TITLE: PGA Tour and LIV Golf are working to extend merger deadline into 2024
SUMMARY: The delay is the latest update in a long and tumultuous saga between the PGA Tour and Saudi Public Investment Fund-backed LIV Golf.

TITLE: The 2024 box office is a franchise frenzy — at a time when audiences are feeling IP fatigue
SUMMARY: The 2024 box office is packed with sequels, prequels and spinoffs, but audiences weren't keen on franchise features in 2023.

TITLE: Rivian stock falls 10% on declining fourth-quarter EV deliveries
SUMMARY: Rivian said it delivered 13,972 vehicles from October through December, down 10.2% from the third quarter of 2023 but in line with Wall Street's expectations.

TITLE: Moderna stock pops after Oppenheimer says Covid shot maker could launch more products over next two years
SUMMARY: The upgrade follows a dismal 2023 for Moderna, whose only commercially available product is its Covid shot.

TITLE: GM's 2023 U.S. vehicle sales were its best since 2019
SUMMARY: General Motors' U.S. vehicle sales increased 14.1% last year to represent the automaker's best year since 2019.

TITLE: Maersk's Red Sea shipping pause highlights challenges for U.S.-led efforts to protect trade
SUMMARY: Maersk's decision to pause Red Sea and Gulf of Aden transits until further notice underscores the difficulty for the U.S.-led Operation Prosperity Guardian.

TITLE: NCAA and ESPN ink 8-year, $920 million media rights deal
SUMMARY: The agreement between the NCAA and ESPN has an annual value of $115 million, nearly triple that of the current deal.

TITLE: Ford reports 7.1% increase in U.S. new vehicle sales as industry marks best year since 2019
SUMMARY: Ford's U.S. sales increased about 7% last year, marking the automaker's best sales since 2020 but coming in lower than the overall industry's growth.

TITLE: Online holiday spending jumps nearly 5% to record, Adobe Analytics says
SUMMARY: Shoppers were drawn in by retailers' deep discounts and leaned on buy now, pay later more than in previous holiday seasons.

TITLE: Peloton shares surge 15% as it partners with TikTok to offer short-form fitness classes, other content
SUMMARY: Peloton is partnering with TikTok as part of its larger strategy to change its public perception and attract a broader array of customers.

SUMMARY: Walgreens cut its dividend to 25 cents per share to "strengthen [its] long-term balance sheet and cash position," said CEO Tim Wentworth.

SUMMARY: The price adjustments come as electric vehicle companies attempt to balance slower-than-expected consumer demand with profits.

SUMMARY: To avoid attacks by Iran-backed Houthi militants based in Yemen, carriers have already diverted more than $200 billion in trade from the Red Sea.

TITLE: Eli Lilly's direct drug sales may not upend the industry alone – but others could follow suit
SUMMARY: LillyDirect is the latest attempt to simplify what critics call a complex system for distributing, pricing and prescribing prescription drugs.

TITLE: Radio shows surprising resilience even in a rapidly changing media world
SUMMARY: Radio has leaned on loyal local audiences over the years. It also has the appeal of offering tickets and other prizes in call-in contests.

TITLE: Florida wins first FDA approval to import cheaper drugs from Canada
SUMMARY: Florida's plan to import drugs from Canada will likely face hurdles before it takes effect, including potential lawsuits from the pharmaceutical industry.

TITLE: Blank Street Coffee relied on low costs to grow — now it's betting on subscriptions
SUMMARY: Blank Street CEO Vinay Menda estimates that the chain's new subscription program could eventually account for 30% to 40% of its customers.

SUMMARY: Sales of the Toyota RAV4 compact crossover came within 10,000 units of Stellantis' Ram pickup truck last year.

TITLE: ESPN star Pat McAfee publicly attacks network executive amid Aaron Rodgers controversy
SUMMARY: ESPN host Pat McAfee publicly called out executive Norby Williamson, accusing him of sabotaging his show.

TITLE: Eli Lilly's direct drug sales alone may not upend the industry, but others could follow suit
SUMMARY: LillyDirect is the latest attempt to simplify what critics call a complex system for distributing, pricing and prescribing prescription drugs.

TITLE: The 2023 U.S. economy, in a dozen charts
SUMMARY: The state of the U.S. economy may be a chief concern among Americans, but 2023 wound up as a pretty good year for the macroenvironment.

SUMMARY: The Federal Aviation Administration grounded dozens of Boeing Max 737 9 planes after a  door plug blew out midair during an Alaska Airlines flight.

TITLE: Mortgage rate decline pulls buyers back into the housing market
SUMMARY: The spring housing market may be getting underway a little early this year.

TITLE: Tiger Woods ends Nike partnership after 27 years

SUMMARY: Cox Automotive expects wholesale used car prices to end the year up 0.5% from December 2023.

SUMMARY: Investors are starting to get a clearer picture of which companies captured more of holiday shoppers' dollars.

SUMMARY: The JPMorgan Healthcare Conference was likely just the beginning of another year of heightened interest and investments in ADC cancer drugs.

SUMMARY: Wall Street has been focused on Novo Nordisk, Eli Lilly and other large drugmakers hoping to join the weight loss drug market, such as Pfizer, Roche and Amgen.
